00_comment: [PORT] Changes Default HTTP port, use this if port is reserved in your environment.
01_comment: [PORT] Changes Default Web Socket port, use this if port is reserved in your environment.
02_comment: [AUTH] Enable Basic Auth, use this setting if you'd like to password protect web server.
03_comment: [AUTH] If Basic Auth Enabled, use this to register username/passwords.
04_comment: [AUTH] If Basic Auth Enabled, use this to mark user as an admin.
